KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DoubleAP_Description: Every AP gain is increased by 1.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Augmented1stStrike_Description: 50% increased damage on the first hit. Once per battle.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Survivor_Description: Survive fatal damage with 1 Health. Once per battle.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LuckyAim_Description: 30% chance to recover 1 AP on hitting a Weak Point.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SecondChance_Description: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SoloFighter_Description: Deal 50% more damage if fighting alone.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Teamwork_Description: 10% increased damage while all allies are alive.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SweetKill_Description: Recover 50% Health on killing an enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AutoPowerful_Description: Apply Powerful for 3 turns on battle start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AutoShell_Description: Apply Shell for 3 turns on battle start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AutoRush_Description: Apply Rush for 3 turns on battle start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AutoRegen_Description: Apply Regen for 3 turns on battle start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Dodger_Description: Gain 1 AP on Perfect Dodge. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ManOfParry_Description: +1 AP on Parry, but damage received is doubled.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Confident_Description: Take 50% less damage, but can't be Healed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ReviveCheer_Description: +3 AP to all allies when revived.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ReviveWithRegen_Description: Apply Regen for 3 turns when revived.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ReviveWithPower_Description: Apply Powerful for 3 turns when revived.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Solidifying_Description: +2 Shields when the character's Health falls below 50%. Once per battle.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PiercingShot_Description:
25% increased Free Aim damage.
Free Aim shots ignore Shields.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealingDeath_Description: On death, the rest of the Expedition recover all Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ShieldingDeath_Description: On death, allies gain 3 Shield points.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_InvertedAffinity_Description:
Apply Inverted on self for 3 turns on battle start.
50% increased damage while Inverted.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LastStand_Description: Deal 50% more damage if Health is below 10%.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_Perfection+butDMG+_De: +1 to all Perfection gain but can't reach Rank S.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ConsumeOnBaseAttack_Des: Base Attack consumes 1 Foretell to deal 30% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_CleanseVirtuose_Descripti: Cleanse self Status Effects when switching to Virtuose Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_ShieldDStance_Description: +1 Shield on switching to Defensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_ShieldOnOSstance_Descript: +1 Shield on switching to Offensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE__ATKDMGUpNoAP_Description: 30% increased Base Attack damage, but it no longer generates AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE__ATKSPDUpNoAP_Description: +300 initiative on Base Attack, but it no longer generates AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE__ATKLifestealLow_Description: Recover up to 20% Health on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE__ATKLifestealMedium_Description: Recover up to 40% Health on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE__ATKLifestealHigh_Description: Recover up to 50% Health on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SosShell_Description: Apply Shell when falling below 50% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SosPower_Description: Apply Powerful when falling below 50% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SosRush_Description: Apply Rush when falling below 50% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DoubleBurn_Description: On applying a Burn stack, apply a second one.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealingFire_Description: Recover 25% Health when attacking a Burning target. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_RewardingMark_Description: +2 AP on dealing damage to a Marked target. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DoubleMark_Description: Mark requires 1 more hit to be removed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Sniper_Description: First Free Aim shot each turn deals 200% increased damage and can Break.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Cheater_Description: Always play twice in a row.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerfulShield_Description: 10% increased damage per Shield Point on self.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BaseShield_Description: +1 Shield if not affected by any Shield on turn start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_InMediasRes_Description: +3 Shields on Battle Start, but max Health is halved.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ShieldAffinity_Description: 30% increased damage while having Shields, but receiving any damage always removes all Shields.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CriticalMoment_Description: 50% increased Critical Chance if Health is below 30%.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FasterThanStrong_Description: Always play twice in a row, but deal 50% less damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Warming_Description: 5% increased damage per turn. Can stack up to 5 times.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Shortcut_Description: Immediately play when falling below 30% Health. Once per battle.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_RandomDefense_Description: Damage taken is randomly multiplied by a value between 50% and 200%.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GlassCanon_Description: Deal 25% more damage, but take 25% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DefensiveMode_Description: On receiving damage, consume 1 AP to take 30% less damage, if possible.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SharedCare_Description: When Healing an ally, also Heal self for 50% of that value.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_EnergizingHeal_Description: On Healing an ally, also give 2 AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerfulHeal_Description: Healing an ally also applies Powerful for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ProtectingHeal_Description: Healing an ally also applies Shell for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AcceleratorHeal_Description: Healing an ally also applies Rush for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ConfidentFighter_Description: 30% increased damage, but can't be Healed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealingShare_Description: Receive 15% of all Heals affecting other characters.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_WeaknessGain_Description: +1 AP on hitting an enemy's Weakness. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_VersatileHealer_Description: +2 AP on Healing an ally. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BeneficialContamination_Descript: +2 AP on applying a Status Effect. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PhysicalFighter_Description: Convert all Skill damage to Physical damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Roulette_Description: Every hit has a 50% chance to deal either 50% or 200% of its damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SoulEater_Description: Deal 30% more damage, but lose 20% Health per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Painter_Description: Convert all Physical damage to Void damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Immaculate_Description: 30% increased damage until a hit is received.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Tainted_Description: 15% increased damage for each Status Effect on self.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FirstOffensive_Description: First hit dealt and taken deals 50% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_IncreasedDamageOnRank: 50% increased damage on Rank D. No damage increase on other ranks.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_PerfectionLostOnHeal_: No Perfection loss on damage taken. Perfection is instead lost on being Healed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_DoublePerfectionVSBur: Base attack gives 1 Perfection per Burn on target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerfulBurn_Description: While Powerful, 20% chance to Burn on hit.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_PerfectionBaseOnCurre: Perfection is now based on current Health. Gain 1 Rank every 20% missing Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_NoPerfectionLossButNo: Can't lose Perfection. No damage increase from Rank.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_RankLossOneByOne_Desc: When hit, lose 1 Perfection instead of 1 Rank.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_StartRankBButLessHP_D: Start battle on Rank B, but 50% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AttackPlayAgain_Description: Play again after a Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_DoubleOnFreeAimShots_: Double Perfection gained on Free Aim shots.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SkillsLightToPhysical_Descriptio: Convert Light damage from Skills to Physical damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LightSkillsRegenHP_Description: Dealing Light damage with a Skill recovers 3% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DMG+OnAlternatingPhysicalLight_D: Casting a Light Skill increases damage of next Physical Skill cast by 50% and vice versa.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AttackConsumeShieldForExtraDMG_D: Base Attack consumes all Shields to deal 100% increased damage per Shield.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DMG+WhenNoDMGTaken_Description: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_MinC_Description: Rank can't be lower than C.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_AttackLifestealOnD_De: On Rank D, recover 20% Health with Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_PerfectionBonusDamage: Bonus damage from Perfection applies to all allies at half value. Bonus damage no longer applies to Verso.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_NoPerfectionLossOnPow: Don't lose Rank when taking damage from Powerless enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_Perfection+1OnPowerle: +1 Perfection on hitting a Powerless enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_Perfection+1OnPowerfu: Perfection gained is increased by 1 while Powerful.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_Perfection+1OnBurn_De: +1 Perfection on hitting a Burning enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_PowerlessOnS_Descript: On reaching Rank S, apply Powerless to all enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_SwitchRankSOnBreak_De:
Switch to Rank S on Break.
Base Attack can Break.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_BurnOnBaseAtkPerRank_: Base Attack applies 2 Burn stack per Rank.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_BurnDamagePerRank_Des: Increase Burn damage by 50% per Rank, up to 300% on Rank S.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_WeakSpotMark_Description: Hitting a Weak Spot applies Marked.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_Heal+OnDStance_Descriptio: 30% increased Heals received in Defensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealOnBurn_Description: Recover 2% Health on hitting a Burning target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VirtuoseDoubleBurn_Descri: In Virtuose Stance, every Burn applied is doubled.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VirtuoseBurnDamageDouble_: In Virtuose Stance, Burn deals double damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_CounterSwitchToVStance_De: Switch to Virtuose Stance on Counterattack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_ShellOutVStance_Descripti: Gain Shell when switching out of Virtuose Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VStancePierce_Description: In Virtuose Stance, all damage pierce Shields.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_StancelessSwitchToOStance: On turn start, if Stanceless, switch to Offensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_StancelessSwitchToDStance: On turn start, if Stanceless, switch to Defensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_StancelessPowerful_Descri: On turn start, gain Powerful if Stanceless.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AttackShield_Description: +1 Shield on Base Attack. (once per turn)
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SelfBurnButDmg+_Description:
Apply Burn on self on turn start.
10% increased damage for each self Burn stack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_BurnHealOnDStance_Descrip: While in Defensive Stance, receive Heal instead of Burn damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_RandomGeneration_Descript: Generate a random Stain on Free Aim shot.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAim+1Shot_Description: Free Aim Shots deal damage to an additional random target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_ElementalCyclingDMG+_Desc:
Casting a Skill increases the Skill damage of all other elements by 20%.
Resets when casting a Skill of a previous element.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_TurnStart+StainsIfNoStain: On turn start, if no Stains, 2 random Stains are generated.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_LightningOnFire_Descripti: When a Fire Stain is generated, a Lightning Stain is also generated. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_EarthOnLightning_Descript: When a Lightning Stain is generated, an Earth Stain is also generated. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_IceOnEarth_Description: When an Earth Stain is generated, an Ice Stain is also generated. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_FireOnIce_Description: When an Ice Stain is generated, a Fire Stain is also generated. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SkillsConversionToPhysical_Descr: Convert all Skill damage to Physical damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_FullCritIfFullStain_Descr: 100% Critical Chance when 4 Stains are simultaneously active.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_+RandomStainOnHeal_Descri: Healing Skills generate one additional Light stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_OverchargeDMG+_Descriptio:
Using a Skill that consumes Stains increases damage by 20%. Can stack up to 5 times.
Resets on using a Skill without consuming Stains.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_FireAppliesBurn_Descripti: Consuming a Fire Stain applies 1 Burn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_IceAppliesSlow_Descriptio: Consuming a Light Stain applies Slow to a random enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_EarthAppliesShield_Descri: Consuming an Earth Stain applies 1 Shield to self.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_LightningAppliesRush_Desc: Consuming a Lightning Stain applies Rush on a random ally.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_AttackFire+_Description: Base Attack generates a Fire Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_AttackLightning+_Descript: Base Attack generates a Lightning Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_AttackEarth+_Description: Base Attack generates an Earth Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_AttackIce+_Description: Base Attack generates an Ice Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_AttackLight+_Description: Base Attack generates a Light Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_Ice+IfSelfFrozen_Descript: Gain 2 Ice Stains and 3 AP when Frozen.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DefreezeAndHealOnTurnStart_Descr: On turn start, if Frozen, remove Freeze and recover 60% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_HealEfficiencyIceStains_D: 30% increased Heal efficiency per Ice Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_IceStainOnTurnStart_Descr: Generate one Ice Stain at the beginning of each turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_InstantReplayOnOverchargedHealSk: Replay instantly on consuming Stains with a Healing Skill.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_EarthStainOnTurnStart_Des: Generate one Earth Stain at the beginning of each turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_IncreaseCritChancePerFire: 30% increased Critical Chance per Fire Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_IncreaseCritChancePerIceS: 30% increased Critical Chance per Ice Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientPointOnCrit_Description: +5% of a Gradient Charge on Critical hit.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_ApplyBurnStackPerFireStai: Base Attack applies 2 Burn per Fire Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_FireStainOnTurnStart_Desc: Generate one Fire Stain at the beginning of each turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_IncreaseBurnDMGPerFireSta: 30% increased Burn damage per Fire Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_IncreaseBreakDMGPerEarthS: 30% increased Break damage per Earth Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_APonBreak_Description: Gain 9 AP on Breaking an enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_InstantReplayOnHittingStunEnemy_: Replay instantly on hitting a Stunned enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_GenerateStainsOnGradientA: Using a Gradient Attack generates 1 additional Light Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_GainGradientChargeOnStain: +5% of a Gradient Charge for each Stain consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientAttackAndCounterDMG+_Des: Gradient Attacks and Gradient Counters deal 50% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_GenerateLightStainRandom_: 50% chance to generate a Light Stain when consuming Stains.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_GainAPOnLightStainConsump: +1 AP on consuming a Light Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_DamagePerLightStain_Descr: 20% increased damage with Skills per active Light Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_GenerateDarkStainRandom_D:
50% chance to generate a Dark Stain when consuming Stains.
Deal 50% more damage with Skills per active Dark Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_ConsumeDarkStainsOnAttack: Base Attacks can consume one Dark Stain to deal 200% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_ConsumeFourDarkStainsDMG+: With 4 active Dark Stains, any Skill can consume them to deal 300% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stains_GenerateLightOrDarkStainR:
50% chance to generate a Dark or Light Stain when consuming Stains.
Deal 50% more damage with Skills per active Dark Stain.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_PropagationOnKill_Descr: Killing an enemy with Foretell applies its Foretell to another random enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_PropagationOnApplicatio: Every time Foretell is applied, it also affects another random enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_AttackConsumeToApplyBur: Base Attack consumes all Foretell to apply Burns instead.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyOnTurnStart_Descri: Apply 1 Foretell to each enemy on turn start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyBurnEveryXForetell: Apply 1 Burn every 3 Foretell applied with Skills.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_FreeAimShotsConsumeForD: Free Aim shots can consume 1 Foretell to deal 100% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SkillsConversionToDark_Descripti: Convert all Skill damage to Dark damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_SunSkillsDMG+PerForetel:
Sun Skills have increased damage for each Foretell on the target.
Moon Skills don't generate Moon charges anymore.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_SunAPIncrease_Descripti: With at least 1 active Sun charge, gain one additional AP per Foretell consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_HealEfficiencyPerMoonCh:
30% increased Heal efficiency per Moon charge.
Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_AttackDMG+PerForetell_D: Base Attack has 30% increased damage for each Foretell on target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_PropagateForetellOnAppl: During Twilight, every time Foretell is applied it also affects another random enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ConsumeChargesOnFreeAim: Free Aim shots can consume a Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell and consume a Moon charge to deal 400% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_GivesAPOnConsumingCharg: Consuming a Sun or Moon charge gives 1 AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_AttackApplyBurnPerSunCh: Base Attack applies one Burn stack per active Sun charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_SunSkillsCharge+_Descri: Sun Skills give one more charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ResetCurseOnTwilight_De: Reset Curse duration when entering Twilight state.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_InstantReplayOnTwilight: Play again when entering Twilight state.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyMaxForetellOnSunSk: Sun Skills always apply 10 Foretell, but all damage taken is doubled.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_AttackConsumeToApplyBur: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge and consumes all Foretell to apply Burn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_OnTwilightBurnDMG+_Desc: 100% increased Burn damage in Twilight state.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_HealOnTurnStartConsumeM: Can consume 1 Moon charge on turn start to recover 20% of each ally's Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_MoonSkillsCharge+_Descr: Moon Skills give one more charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_DarkConversionOnTwiligh: During Twilight, all damage dealt is converted to Dark damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_BuffsOnStates_Descripti: Apply Shell during Moon, Powerful during Sun, and Rush during Twilight.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ShieldOnTurnStartWhenSu: On turn start, gain 1 Shield if at least 1 Sun charge is active.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyForetellOnShieldBr: Apply 5 Foretell on enemies that break Shields.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyBurnOnHitTakenOnSu: While having at least 1 active Sun charge, apply one Burn stack per hit taken.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyBurnPerSunChargeOn: Counterattacks apply 1 Burn per active Sun charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_MoonSkillsAlwaysCritOnM: While having at least 1 active Moon charge, Moon Skills are always Critical but damage taken is doubled.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ExtendOrIncreaseTwiligh: Extend Twilight by one turn on using a Moon Skill. +50% Twilight damage increase on using a Sun Skill.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_DealAOEDamagePerChargeO: On Twilight Start, deal damage to all enemies based on the amount of charges.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyForetellPerChargeO: On Twilight Start, apply 2 Foretell per charge to all enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_DoubleChargeGain_Descri: Double Sun and Moon charge generation.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_OnTwilightSwitchApplyMa: On Twilight Start, apply Mark to all enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_DontRemoveMarkOnTwiligh: Hitting a Marked enemy during Twilight doesn't remove Mark.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyGreaterRushSlowOnS:
During Moon, all allies have Greater Rush.
During Sun, all enemies have Greater Slow.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_ApplyGreaterRushSlowOnT: During Twilight, all allies have Greater Rush and all enemies have Greater Slow.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GainAPOnApplyBuffsDebuffs_Descri: +3 AP on applying a Buff or Debuff. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_GainAPPerMoonChargeOnTu: +1 AP per Moon charge on turn start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_BaseAttackConsumeAllAPO:
During Twilight, Base Attack consumes all AP.
Base Attack applies 1 Foretell and deals 50% increased damage per AP consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_TwilightFreeAimDMG+_Des: During Twilight, Free Aim shots deal double damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_ShellOnHeavy_Description: Heavy Mask applies Shell for 3 turns.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_PowerfulOnBalanced_Descrip: Balanced Mask applies Powerful for 3 turns.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_RegenOnCaster_Description: Caster Mask applies Regen for 3 turns.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_RushOnAgile_Description: Agile Mask applies Rush for 3 turns.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_BestialMeter+OnSkillCast_D: Using a Skill to update the Bestial Wheel moves it 1 step further.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_BestialMeter+OnParrybutRes: Parries increase the Bestial Wheel by 1. Taking damage resets the Bestial Wheel.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_WheelSpinOnFreeAimShot_Des: Free Aim shots spin the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_Overcharge+APOnAllies_Desc: Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 AP to all other allies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_BestialMeterRandomIncremen: Add a random value between -3 and +3 to the Bestial Wheel on Skill cast.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_AttackAP-ButAlmighty_Descr: Using Base Attack consumes 1 AP, but moves the Bestial Wheel to Almighty.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_HeavyAPCost-1_Description: Heavy Mask Skills cost 1 less AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_BalancedAPCost-1_Descripti: Balanced Mask Skills cost 1 less AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_CasterAPCost-1_Description: Skills cost 1 less AP while in Caster Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_AgileAPCost-1_Description: Agile Mask Skills cost 1 less AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_APCost-1IfAlmighty_Descrip: Almighty Mask Skills cost 1 less AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_CritChanceOnAgile_Descript: +50% Critical Chance while in Agile Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_DoubleBreakDMGOnAlmighty_D: Break damage is doubled while in Almighty Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_GainAPAllAlliesOnAlmightyS: Almighty Mask gives 2 AP to all allies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_SwitchToAlmightyOnBreak_De: Switch to Almighty Mask on Breaking an enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_DMG+FreeAimIfNotAlmighty_D: Free Aim shots deal 100% more damage with all Masks except Almighty.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_AlwaysCritOnAlmighty_Descr: 100% Critical Chance while in Almighty Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_InstantReplayOnAlmighty_De: Replay instantly when in Almighty Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_InstantReviveOnDeathOnAlmi: Revive instantly with full Health if dead while in Almighty Mask. Once per Battle.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_DMG+BonusStackOnOvercharge: 30% increased damage per Upgraded Skill used. Resets on using a non-Upgraded Skill.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_WheelSpinOnAttack_Descript: Base Attack spins the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Masks_CritDMG+OnBalanced_Descrip: Critical hits deal 30% more damage while in Balanced Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_StartRankSButNoHeal_D: Start battle at Rank S, but can't be Healed or gain Shields.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BurningMark_Description: Apply Burn on hitting a Marked enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerfulMark_Description: Gain Powerful on hitting a Marked enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealingMark_Description: Recover 25% Health on hitting a Marked enemy. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_StayMarked_Description: 50% chance to apply Mark when attacking a Marked target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAimBurnShot_Description: 20% chance to Burn on Free Aim shot.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAimMarkingShot_Description: 20% chance to apply Mark on Free Aim shot.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAimPowerful_Description: 20% chance to gain Powerful on Free Aim shot.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAimShell_Description: 20% chance to gain Shell on Free Aim shot.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAimSpeed_Description: 20% chance to gain Rush on Free Aim shot.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAimEnergy_Description: 20% chance to gain 1 AP on Free Aim shot.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Versatile_Description: After a Free Aim hit, Base Attack damage is increased by 50% for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerfulStrike_Description: Gain Powerful for 1 turn on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ShellStrike_Description: Gain Shell for 1 turn on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerlessStrike_Description: Base Attack applies Powerless for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DefenslessStrike_Description: Base Attack applies Defenceless for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ReinforcementParade_Description:
Each successful Parry increases damage by 5% until end of the following turn.
Taking any damage removes this buff.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerOfPain_Description: No longer gain AP on Parry. +1 AP on getting hit.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FullEnergyAttack_Description:
On every damage dealt, try to consume 1 AP.
If successful, increase damage by 20%.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_AttackConsumeBurnToAppl: Consuming Foretell applies 2 Burn on target per Sun Charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DeathBomb_Description: On Death, deal damage to all enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SimpleBreaker_Description: 50% increased Break damage on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakMomentum_Description: Play again on Breaking a target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakingStrong_Description: Gain Powerful on Breaking a target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_StunEnergy_Description: +1 AP on hitting a Stunned target with a Skill.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealingStun_Description: Recover 5% Health on hitting a Stunned target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BurningBreak_Description: Apply 3 Burn stacks on Breaking a target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CriticalBreak_Description: 100% Critical Chance on hitting a Stunned target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientBreak_Description: +50% of a Gradient Charge on Breaking a target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakShot_Description: 50% increased Break damage with Free Aim shots.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GreatFireBreak_Description: Breaking a target doubles its Burn amount.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientHeal_Description: Recover 10% Health on using a Gradient Charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientStacker_Description: +15% of a Gradient Charge on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientBreaker_Description: 50% increased Break damage with Gradient Attacks.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientCure_Description: 50% increased Gradient Generation with Healing Skills.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientCounterCharge_Descriptio: +10% of a Gradient Charge on Counterattack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientWeakness_Description: +15% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Weakness. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientMark_Description: +20% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Marked target. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GreatHealingTint_Description: Healing Tints have double the Healing effect.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CleansingTint_Description: Healing Tints also remove all Status Effects from the target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BigHealingTint_Description: Healing Tints now affect the whole Expedition.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BigEnergyTint_Description: Energy Tints now affect the whole Expedition.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientTint_Description: +5% of a Gradient Charge on using an item.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_APOnBurn_Description: +1 AP on applying Burn. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakDamageOnBurn_Description: 25% increased Break damage on Burning enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CritChanceOnBurn_Description: 25% increased Critical Chance on Burning enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BurningDeath_Description: Apply 3 Burn to all enemies on Death.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakDamageOnCrit_Description: 25% increased Break damage on Critical hits.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CritChanceOnDefenseless_Descript: 25% increased Critical Chance on Defenceless enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerDodgeCombo_Description: 5% increased damage for each consecutive successful Dodge. Can stack up to 10 times.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakSpecialist_Description: Break damage is increased by 50%, but base damage is reduced by 20%.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakingDeath_Description: Fully charge enemy's Break Bar on death.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakDamageOnSlow_Description: 25% increased Break damage against Slowed enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LongerPowerful_Description: On applying Powerful, its duration is increased by 2.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LongerShell_Description: On applying Shell, its duration is increased by 2.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LongerRush_Description: On applying Rush, its duration is increased by 2.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_EvasiveHealer_Description: Heals provided are doubled until any damage is taken.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealOnBuff_Description: Heal 15% HP on applying a buff.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AutoDispelEnergy_Description: Dispel the first negative Status Effect received and gain 2 AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DispelOnAPConsume_Description: Consume 1 AP to prevent Status Effects application, if possible.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealOnWeakness_Description: Self-Heal by 2% Health on hitting elemental weakness.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_HealOnCrit_Description: Self-Heal by 2% Health on dealing a Critical hit.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakDamageOnBaseAttack_Descript: Increase Break damage on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakDamageOnWeakness_Descriptio: Increase Break damage on hitting elemental weakness.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PowerlessOnMarking_Description: Apply Powerless on Marking an enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_MarkOnBaseAttack_Description: Mark an enemy on Base Attack.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AlwaysCritOnCounterDamage_Descri: Counterattack is always a Critical hit.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LightDMGBurnOnCrit_Description: Light damage can Burn on Critical hits.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_TriggerLightningOnCrit_Descripti: Triggers a lightning strike on Critical hits.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_AttackOffensive_Descripti: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Offensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_CritChanceOffensive_Descr: +50% Critical Chance while in Offensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_CritDamageOffensive_Descr: +30% Critical Damage while in Offensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_APOnShield_Description: On applying Shields, also give 1 AP.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VirtuoseDoubleShields_Des: On switching to Virtuose Stance, double all Shields on allies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VirtuoseHealAllies_Descri: Allies recover 20% Health on switching to Virtuose Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_ShellOnHighHP_Description: Applies Shell when Health is above 80%.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VirtuoseOnLowHP_Descripti: Switch to Virtuose Stance when Health falls below 50%.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_DefensiveSharedAP_Descrip: In Defensive Stance, gaining AP also gives 1 AP to allies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_AttackDefensive_Descripti: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_StealShield_Description: Steal Shields removed by hitting enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VirtuoseOnShieldBreak_Des: Switch to Virtuose Stance on breaking any Shield.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_MarkBreakShields_Description: Hitting a Marked enemy breaks all its Shields.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_ShieldOnParry_Description:
On Defensive Stance, gain 1 Shield per Parry.
Lose all Shields on turn start.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_DefensiveGradientCharges_: Double Gradient generation while in Defensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientChargesOnParry_Descripti: +5% of a Gradient Charge on Parry.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_CritChanceDefensive_Descr: +50% Critical Chance while in Defensive Stance.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_APOnCrit_Description: Critical hits with Skills give 2 AP. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_OffensiveBurnStacks_Descr: In Offensive Stance, double the amount of Burn applied.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_VirtuoseKeepMark_Descript: In Virtuose Stance, hitting a Marked enemy doesn't remove Mark.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Stance_DefensiveBreakDamage_Desc: In Defensive Stance, double Break damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BreakEarthBurst_Description: Breaking an enemy deals a high amount of Earth damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ParryDamageNoDodge_Description: Can't Dodge. +5% increased damage per Parry until damage taken.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientOnCrit_Description: +20% of a Gradient Charge on Critical Hit. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientOnBurn_Description: +20% of a Gradient Charge on applying Burn. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientOnStun_Description: +5% of a Gradient Charge on hitting a Stunned enemy.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientOnBuff_Description: +10% of a Gradient Charge on applying a Buff. Once per turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BestDefense_Description: Deal 50% more damage, but can't Parry or Dodge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BonusHealthNoDefense_Description: Reduce damage taken by 50%, but can't Parry or Dodge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_CurseSelfButDMG+_Descri:
Curse self on battle start.
Deal 50% more damage while Cursed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreezeSelfOnLowHP2_Description:
Freeze self when falling below 30% health.
Prevent the next instance of damage while Frozen.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DoubleHit_Description: An ethereal Sword deals Light damage on any damage dealt with Skills.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LightDamageBurn_Description: 20% chance to apply Burn on dealing Light damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Perfection_SurvivorRankA_Descrip: Can't die if at least Rank A.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ParrySpecialist_Description: 25% reduced Parry window but double Counterattack damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DodgeSpecialist_Description: 25% reduced Dodge window, but 50% chance to gain 1 AP on successful Dodge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Foretell_AttackConsumeSunCharge_: Base attack can consume 1 Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CleasLife_Description: On turn start, if no damage taken since last turn, recover 100% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SOSHealingTint_Description: Consume a Healing Tint when falling below 50% Health.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientParry_Description: +5% of a gradient charge on Parry.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_GradientOvercharge_Description: On turn start, consume 3 Gradient Charges (if able) to deal 200% more damage this turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ConsumingAttack_Description: Base attack consumes up to 100 Burns to deal 10% more damage per Burn consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LongerBreak_Description: Breaks last 1 more turn but the target can't be Broken twice.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Frenzy_Description: Each successive Skill hit deals 10% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DoubleThird_Description: Every third hit of a Skill deals double damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SlowingAttack_Description: Base attack applies Slow for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_EmpoweredHealer_Description: Using a Healing Skill gives 50% more damage for 1 turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DamageShare_Description: 50% damage taken is redirected to other allies (if possible).
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_Feint_Description:
Start each turn with 4 Barbapapa stacks.
Every 5th hit with a Skill deals 600% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_TriggerHappy_Description: After shooting 10 times in the same turn, gain +2 AP (once). And following Shots this turn deal 200% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_EmpoweringJumps_Description: Counters deal 100% more damage for each successful Jump Counter this turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AlternatingCritical_Description: On Critical hit, 100% increased damage of the next non-Critical hit.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FirstLife_Description: 25% increased damage until death. 20% decreased damage on death. (Once)
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CleasDeath_Description: On death, allies gain 25% increased damage until they die.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PerfectDefense_Description: Ranks reduce damage taken by 20% per Rank, instead of increasing damage dealt.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DamageOnPerfectionRank_Descripti: 25% increased damage on Rank up. Resets on taking damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_PerfectionOnDamage_Description:
Gain Perfection on receiving damage instead of Parrying or Dodging.
Lose 1 Rank on Parry or Dodge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DamageBonusPerHit_Description: Each successive Skill hit deals 10% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_firstHitApplyMark_Description: First hit of a Skill applies Mark.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SecondHitDontConsumeMark_Descrip: Second hit of a Skill and following hits don't consume Mark.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_More4ApDamageBonus_Description: On turn start, consume each AP above 4 to gain 50% more damage per AP consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BurnInVirtuose_Description: On Virtuose, all hits apply Burn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_InflictMarkIfSkillLess4Ap_Descri: Using a Skill that costs less than 4 AP applies Mark to all enemies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_CritPerBurn_Description: +5% Critical chance per Burn on the target.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ThunderSkillConsumeBurn_Descript: Lightning Skills consume up to 100 Burn to deal 2% more damage per Burn consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_NoOverchargeSkillBuff_Descriptio:
Using a Skill that doesn't consume Stains increases damage by 20%.
Resets on using a Skill that consumes Stains.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BaseAttackToDarkStain_Descriptio: Base attack changes all current Stains into Dark Stains.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FreeAimForwardWheel_Description: Free Aim Shots move the Bestial Wheel 1 step forward.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DamagePerMaskChange_Description: 25% increased damage per Mask change this turn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_DoubleFreeAimDamageAlmighty_Desc: Free Aim shots deal double damage while in Almighty Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BaseAttackToHeavy_Description: Base Attack moves the Bestial Wheel to Heavy Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ShieldAllHeroesOnHeavy_Descripti: Heavy Mask gives 1 Shield to all allies.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ReducedDamageOnHeavy_Description: Damage taken are reduced by 50% while in Heavy Mask.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FourthHitForetell_Description: Every fourth hit with a Skill generates 1 Sun charge and applies 5 Foretell.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ChargesBalance_Description: Can't enter Twilight. On turn start, if Moon and Sun charges are balanced, deal 100% more damage and apply double Foretell.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_RandomChargeTurnStart_Descriptio:
On turn start, remove all Sun and Moon charges. 
Then, randomly gain 1 Sun or 1 Moon charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AttackSunItemMoon_Description: Base attack adds 1 Sun charge. Using a Tint adds 1 Moon charge.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AureoleRankSToD_Description: Gain Aureole on Rank S, but drop to Rank D.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AlmightyDoubleBurn_Description: Almighty Mask gives 50% increased damage (cumulative) and doubles enemies' Burn.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_AlmightyConsumeBurn_Description: Almighty Mask Skills consume up to 100 Burn to deal 2% more damage per Burn consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_FrenzyAttack_Description: Each successive base attack hit on the same turn deals 100% more damage.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_ShotApplyAttackConsumeForetell_D: Free Aim shots apply 1 Foretell. Base attack consumes all Foretell to deal 50% more damage per Foretell consumed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_TwilightForetellNotConsumed_Desc: During Twilight, any Foretell consumed is not removed.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_BypassAffinities_Description: Damage cant be reduced, blocked, or absorbed by Elemental Affinities.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_LuneDoubleHit_Description: An ethereal Sword deals Light damage on any damage dealt with Skills.
KeysToEntries.PASSIVE_SimonimOvercharge_Description: Starting a turn with 1 Earth, 1 Fire, 1 Ice, and 1 Lightning Stain doubles damage dealt this turn.

PASSIVE_AlmightyDoubleBurn_Description.Context: "cumulative" here means it can be stacked multiple times
